scripts.clean: pnpm clean:node && pnpm clean:wrangler && pnpm clean:etc
scripts.d1:migrate:list:PRODUCTION: wrangler d1 migrations list tanstack-sandbox3-d1-production --env production --remote
scripts.d1:migrate:apply:PRODUCTION: wrangler d1 migrations apply tanstack-sandbox3-d1-production --env production --remote
scripts.refs:shadcn: rm -rf refs/shadcn && mkdir -p refs/shadcn && curl -L https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/archive/refs/tags/shadcn@3.6.2.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/shadcn --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-form: rm -rf refs/tan-form && mkdir -p refs/tan-form && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/form/archive/refs/tags/@tanstack/react-form@1.27.7.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-form --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:base-ui: rm -rf refs/base-ui && mkdir -p refs/base-ui && curl -L https://github.com/mui/base-ui/archive/refs/tags/v1.0.0.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/base-ui --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-router: rm -rf refs/tan-router && mkdir -p refs/tan-router && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/router/archive/refs/tags/v1.144.0.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-router --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-start: rm -rf refs/tan-start && mkdir -p refs/tan-start && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/router/archive/refs/tags/v1.145.3.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-start --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:crrbuis: rm -rf refs/crrbuis && mkdir -p refs/crrbuis && curl -L https://github.com/mw10013/cloudflare-react-router-bui-saas/archive/refs/heads/main.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/crrbuis --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:better-auth: rm -rf refs/better-auth && mkdir -p refs/better-auth && curl -L https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/archive/refs/tags/v1.3.32.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/better-auth --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:saas-kit: rm -rf refs/saas-kit && mkdir -p refs/saas-kit && curl -L https://github.com/backpine/saas-kit/archive/refs/heads/main.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/saas-kit --strip-components=1
